MlIntentUtteranceSuggestion.name: MlIntentUtteranceSuggestion
MlIntentUtteranceSuggestion.description: Represents a customer input, used for training purposes in the feedback loop process of a conversation. Admins can add these inputs to the intent training model.

Utterance.description: The text input from the end user.

UtteranceCount.description: A count of the Utterance field.
